headline.main: Professor Wants More College Classes Taught in Hawaiian
headline.print_headline: Professor Wants More College Classes Taught in Hawaiian

lead_paragraph: A University of Hawaii professor is working to get an entire curriculum at the university taught in Hawaiian to supplement the language courses taught to children across the state.
snippet: A University of Hawaii professor is working to get an entire curriculum at the university taught in Hawaiian to supplement the language courses taught to children across the state....
